amendment.description: To allocate amounts for opioid prevention and treatment programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3416 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3416 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Budd to Amendment SA 3411.
